actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish the Lake Clark National Park in the State of Alaska, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Establishes Lake Clark National Park, Alaska. Specifies guidelines relating to the acquisition of lands, the use of renewable resources, and the provisions of visitor services within such park.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Lake Clark National Park in the State of Alaska, and for other purposes.
